about_the_game:
Be Harpagun. Get stranded on a deserted planet. Destroy your rocket. Get swarmed by insane critters. Wreck stuff, throw aliens, argue with your crew, and smash enemies. Meet a girl. Have hallucinations. Listen to slav beats. Shoot living grenades. Play demo with 3 levels and an arena mode.

What is? Look at gifs.

This a game. In VR. With story and stuff. Also combat. A lot of combat. It’s good - you have weapons but won’t use them cause it’s more fun to take a washing machine and slam it into an alien’s head.

You can move stuff with a gravity ray. Enemies too, just yeet them into a wall or something and they die.

It’s an arcade game. You know, one of the ones you actually have fun playing. Like an on-rails-shooter but not really because you can move around and don’t puke. Just try it, it works. If not - return to sender, spend money on other stuff.

Ok, I’m out. No more to say. Watch gifs, wishlist, download, spend good time. Leave comment. Visit discord. Bye.

Game Features:

- Sink into combat - feel the flow of battle overtake you

- Grab, swing, smash - fling around objects and enemies like on a country

disco

- Delightful destruction - enjoy a trip through a forgotten planet and wreak

havoc along the way

- Enticing enemies - designed specifically to die in most satisfying way

- Vibrant visuals - the end of the world has never been so colorful

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • VR Support: Steam VR

short_description: Harpagun is a fast-paced VR arcade shooter demo featuring 3 action-packed levels and an arena mode. Smash alien critters, argue with your crew, and wreak havoc using weapons or objects with a gravity ray. Built for VR, it offers chaotic fun, immersive combat, and a wild, hilarious storyline.
